interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2013/04/12
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Egami'], 'Starring': ['Gabriel Iglesias'], 'Studio': ['Egami']}
Review Text: Stand up comedy at it's finest!  Yes there are some "adult" themes but it was very refreshing to watch a entertainer that wasn't dropping a F bomb and words related to it every 5 minutes.  Not that I find that kind of language offensive but to have a comedian not rely on those words to be funny... I'll be buying the DVD...
Review Title: Funny, Funny, Funny!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
